thread.title: Arizona isn’t putting brakes on self-driving cars yet

title: Arizona isn’t putting brakes on self-driving cars yet
text:
Arizona isn’t putting brakes on self-driving cars yet Tuesday, March 20, 2018 - 02:00 
Arizona has been described by some as the 'wild west' of robot car testing. Now the first death from a self-driving vehicle happened in Tempe, Arizona raising questions about how it happened and why here. Jane Lanhee Lee reports.
